snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a face-blurring tool on YouTube and one of the first photos of what became the iPad.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a face-blurring tool on YouTube and one of the first photos of what became the iPad.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Protecting Dissidents on YouTube, and Running Late
